member.name: HTTP_LOG_FIELDS_DATA
member.summary: The HTTP_LOG_FIELDS_DATA structure is used to pass the fields that are logged for an HTTP response when WC3 logging is enabled.

member.name: HTTP_LOG_FIELDS_DATA.Base
member.summary: Initialize this member to the HttpLogDataTypeFields value of the enumeration.

member.name: HTTP_LOG_FIELDS_DATA.UserNameLength
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of the user name member.

member.name: HTTP_LOG_FIELDS_DATA.UriStemLength
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of the URI stem member.

member.name: HTTP_LOG_FIELDS_DATA.ClientIpLength
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of the client IP address member.

member.name: HTTP_LOG_FIELDS_DATA.ServerNameLength
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of the server name member.

member.name: HTTP_LOG_FIELDS_DATA.ServerIpLength
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of the server IP address member.

member.name: HTTP_LOG_FIELDS_DATA.MethodLength
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of the HTTP method member.

member.name: HTTP_LOG_FIELDS_DATA.UriQueryLength
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of the URI query member.

member.name: HTTP_LOG_FIELDS_DATA.HostLength
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of the host name member.

member.name: HTTP_LOG_FIELDS_DATA.UserAgentLength
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of the user agent member.

member.name: HTTP_LOG_FIELDS_DATA.CookieLength
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of the cookie member.

member.name: HTTP_LOG_FIELDS_DATA.ReferrerLength
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of the referrer member.

member.name: HTTP_LOG_FIELDS_DATA.UserName
member.summary: The name of the user.
